quotes: Aren't you gonna stay for brunch?
Oh non ! Sacrebleu ! Plus de marques de cutie ! Qu'est-ce que c'est ? Je parle français ?
Oh no, Darn it, another cutie mark! What is this, I'm speaking French?!
I'm not a baby, I can take care of myself!
Somepony needs to put this thing out of its misery.
You're not using power tools, are you?
Maybe we'll get our cutie marks in stupidest ideas of all time.
